TEXT.S:
Carlos Boozer
siwkay niza nalecuhan i Aschaffenburg, West Germany, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Carlos Boozer i 2002 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 35, namapili' tu nu Cleveland Cavaliers putiput. tatama, lumeniay a banges, u West Germany kanatal a tademaw. nalecuhan i 11 a bulad 20 a demiad, 1981 a mihca, Carlos Boozer, miunduay.
